name: tickle
effect: Lowers the target’s Attack and Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Attack and Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.
